owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

addMerchant(address).notice: Allows the owner of the contract to add a merchant

removeMerchant(address).notice: Allows the owner of the contract to remove a merchant

setIssuer(address).notice: Allows the owner of the contract to set the issuer

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct IndexedMapping.Data storage pointer,address) view returns (bool)
function (struct IndexedMapping.Data storage pointer,uint256) view returns (address)
function (struct IndexedMapping.Data storage pointer) view returns (address[] memory)
